section.p: The Medications Administered Section usually resides inside a Procedure Note describing a procedure. This section defines medications and fluids administered during the procedure, its related encounter, or other procedure related activity excluding anesthetic medications. Anesthesia medications should be documented as described in the Anesthesia Section templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.25.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-8152, CONF:1098-10405, CONF:1098-32525 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15383)/@code="29549-3" Medications Administered (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15384, CONF:1098-30829)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8156, CONF:1098-15499)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Medications Administered Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15383)/@code="29549-3" Medications Administered (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15384, CONF:1098-30829)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8154, R2.0=CONF:1098-8154)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8155, R2.0=CONF:1098-8155)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-8156, CONF:1098-15499)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
